name: A Day at Home
description:
I created this for AccessJam 2022.

It is a short experience aimed at showing some of the obstacles a disabled person may face at home and how these can be overcome.

All artwork was created by me, except for the images for the controls which are credited below.

Keyboard icons created by Freepik - https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/keyboard

Left icons created by Freepik - https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/left

Escape icons created by Pixel Perfect - https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/escape
